version_description:
Fixed sync crash on 32-bit devices
Minor fixes

Fixed sync crash on 32-bit devices
Minor fixes

New options: text alignment, hyphenations, position indicator colours
Dark (night) theme for alert dialogues
Fixed undo menu behaviour
Minor fixes in text formatting

New options: text alignment, hyphenations, position indicator colours
Dark (night) theme for alert dialogues
Fixed undo menu behaviour
Minor fixes in text formatting

iPhone X support.
Flexible tap zones settings (Settings => Screen => Tap Zones).
Volume buttons page turning (disabled by default).

iPhone X support.
Flexible tap zones settings (Settings => Screen => Tap Zones).
Volume buttons page turning (disabled by default).

Fixed colour picker crash on iOS 11.2.
Toolbar does not overlap long footnote text.

Fixed colour picker crash on iOS 11.2.
Toolbar does not overlap long footnote text.

* Added 'Retry' button in the translation failure message
* Fixed selection rendering
* Minor fixes

Fixed colour picker crash on iOS 11.2.
Toolbar does not overlap long footnote text.
Fixed ePub regressions introduced in version 1.0.4

* Added 'Retry' button in the translation failure message
* Fixed selection rendering
* Minor fixes

Fixed colour picker crash on iOS 11.2.
Toolbar does not overlap long footnote text.
Fixed ePub regressions introduced in version 1.0.4

The app ignores some XML errors in fb2 and ePub books.
Fixed synchronisation issue that caused loss of positions during the ​first sync of a new device.

The app ignores some XML errors in fb2 and ePub books.
Fixed synchronisation issue that caused loss of positions during the ​first sync of a new device.

* Better default settings for new iPhones (XS, XS Max, XR).
* Fixed some text formatting issues.

* Better default settings for new iPhones (XS, XS Max, XR).
* Fixed some text formatting issues.

Fixed reading ePub archives with non-ASCII entry names.
The app hides home indicator on iPad in reading mode.

Fixed reading ePub archives with non-ASCII entry names.
The app hides home indicator on iPad in reading mode.
Fixed issue with opening some fb2 archives introduced in 1.0.8
Fixed issue with opening some fb2 archives introduced in 1.0.8

* Compatibility with iOS 13
* Fixed old “wrong sync after reading offline” issue

* Compatibility with iOS 13
* Fixed old “wrong sync after reading offline” issue

* Added file picker dialogue.
* On iOS 13, the app switches day/night colour profile automatically, according to system-wide light/dark mode. If you want to set the profiles independently, turn off “Respect system light/dark mode” in the app settings.
* CSS style processing change: the app allows manual zoom in/out even if CSS defined font size is fixed.

* Added file picker dialogue.
* On iOS 13, the app switches day/night colour profile automatically, according to system-wide light/dark mode. If you want to set the profiles independently, turn off “Respect system light/dark mode” in the app settings.
* CSS style processing change: the app allows manual zoom in/out even if CSS defined font size is fixed.

* Added file picker dialogue.
* On iOS 13, the app switches day/night colour profile automatically, according to system-wide light/dark mode. If you want to set the profiles independently, turn off “Respect system light/dark mode” in the app settings.
* CSS style processing change: the app allows manual zoom in/out even if CSS defined font size is fixed.

* Added file picker dialogue.
* On iOS 13, the app switches day/night colour profile automatically, according to system-wide light/dark mode. If you want to set the profiles independently, turn off “Respect system light/dark mode” in the app settings.
* CSS style processing change: the app allows manual zoom in/out even if CSS defined font size is fixed.

* Fixed volume buttons page turning
* Added Chinese line breaking
* Minor fixes

* Fixed volume buttons page turning
* Added Chinese line breaking
* Minor fixes

* Fixed opening of local fb2 files via the built-in picker
* Minor fixes

* Fixed opening of local fb2 files via the built-in picker
* Minor fixes

* Added 'Retry' button in the translation failure message
* Fixed selection rendering
* Minor fixes

* Added 'Retry' button in the translation failure message
* Fixed selection rendering
* Minor fixes

修复了同步问题。
添加了流行语言的本地化界面：中文、法语、德语、西班牙语等。

修复了同步问题。
添加了流行语言的本地化界面：中文、法语、德语、西班牙语等。
小型用户界面修复
小型用户界面修复
* Fixed non-breakable spaces and other special symbols displaying
* Fixed non-breakable spaces and other special symbols displaying
Urgent fix: Yandex.Translate temporary replaced with Google.Translate
Urgent fix: Yandex.Translate temporary replaced with Google.Translate
iOS 14 compatibility: restored custom fonts access; new popup menu in the library view.
iOS 14 compatibility: restored custom fonts access; new popup menu in the library view.

iPhone 12 devices compatibility.
Added scalable single image view: long tap on an image to open it; then use pinch gestures to scale the image.

iPhone 12 devices compatibility.
Added scalable single image view: long tap on an image to open it; then use pinch gestures to scale the image.
Stability fixes. Minor text formatting fixes.
Stability fixes. Minor text formatting fixes.
Minor stability fixes.
Minor stability fixes.
iOS 15 and iPhone 13 series compatibility.
iOS 15 and iPhone 13 series compatibility.

Minor UI fixes.
Series support for ePub3 books.
"Invert images in dark mode" option (off by default).

Minor UI fixes.
Series support for ePub3 books.
"Invert images in dark mode" option (off by default).

* Added continuous vertical scrolling in single column mode.
* Added the 'page-turning threshold' option. It defines the minimum distance you need to swipe text to turn the page.
* Renderer uses colours from embedded ePub styles. You can disable these colours in the preferences.
* Broken Yandex translator replaced with DeepL.
* Implemented full synchronization of bookmarks styles with desktop FBReader. Using the desktop version, you can add and remove styles.

* Added continuous vertical scrolling in single column mode.
* Added the 'page-turning threshold' option. It defines the minimum distance you need to swipe text to turn the page.
* Renderer uses colours from embedded ePub styles. You can disable these colours in the preferences.
* Broken Yandex translator replaced with DeepL.
* Implemented full synchronization of bookmarks styles with desktop FBReader. Using the desktop version, you can add and remove styles.

Fixed running the app on devices with iOS 9.3.x.
Minor fixes in vertical scrolling and positions sync.

Fixed running the app on devices with iOS 9.3.x.
Minor fixes in vertical scrolling and positions sync.
